About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

SUMMARY

I am a Customer-oriented Web Developer skilled to build end-to-end web applications from architecture and design through development to deployments and maintenance.

Tech expertise

Software skills

I am proficient in: JavaScript, HTML, CSS, jQuery, Ruby on Rails, Node.js, React/Redux, Webpack REST/JSON, TDD, Cloud platforms as Heroku, DigitalOcean, Netlify, AWS. Experienced in Database technologies such as PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB, Firebase and have a good understanding of server-side technologies.

Background

Experience summary

I have over 10 years experience planning and deploying small and large-scale projects within the leading technology companies as Nokia Corporation, Huawei Technologies, Relacom.

Accomplishments: an application for pricing consolidation for BID division in Nokia (+30% workflow efficiency improved).

Personality

Soft skills

I am a collaborative person with strong analysis, problem-solving and troubleshooting skills. Having a can-do attitude, multi-tasking, passion for technology, enjoy working in a team-oriented environment, and able to learn quickly.
